pages.title: Spell Binding
pages.text: Use the $(key)Spell Binding Table$() to get your first $(mage/book)spell book$() and bind some spells!$(br2)You can find a $(key)Spell Binding Table$() in $(bold)villages$(), or craft one yourself.$(br2)Place some $(key)bookshelves$() around the $(key)Spell Binding Table$() to bind more spells.
